attributes.action: House our homeless in the UK before taking refugees/asylum seekers
attributes.background: It is the right of the citizens of the UK who are homeless or on long waiting lists to be housed before the government accept refugees or economic migrants into the UK

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107542

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
